meanings.sent2: She always stays up postmidnight to study.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to have a postmidnight dance party.
meanings.sent5: The postmidnight silence was broken by a distant siren.

meanings.sent3: The postmidnight visitors brought unexpected joy.
meanings.sent4: The postmidnight sky was filled with mystery.
meanings.sent5: The postmidnight air was cool and refreshing.

meanings.definition: The period of time following midnight
meanings.sent1: He was always awake during postmidnight.
meanings.sent2: The postmidnight hours were his favorite.
meanings.sent3: The postmidnight of New Year's Eve is full of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The postmidnight of the city never sleeps.
meanings.sent5: The postmidnight of the forest is peaceful and serene.
